  • Method Details

    • getProgressBar

      public static String getProgressBar(String name, int total, int done, int length, AnsiColors barColor)
      Get a progress bar to console.
      Parameters:
      name - name which will precede the progress bar.
      total - Total number of things;
      done - How many of the total, is done;
      length - The length of the bar in characters.
      barColor - Color of the bar.
      Returns:

    • progressBar

      Prints a progress bar to console.
      Parameters:
      name - name which will precede the progress bar.
      total - Total number of things;
      done - How many of the total, is done;
      length - The length of teh bar in Characters.
      barColor - Color of the bar.
